HomeSection.question:

FeatureSection.title:
Why should you 
 Work with us?
FeatureSection.feature_1_name: You don't need a technical specification
FeatureSection.feature_2_name: You don't overpay for unnecessary managers
FeatureSection.feature_1_description: Your task is to tell us about your problem, and we will create a technical specification and find the best solutions to solve it.
FeatureSection.feature_2_description: We are a small team focused on results. You communicate directly with specialists without wasting time on a manager.
FeatureSection.feature_3_description: By following Elon Musk's principles, we were able to speed up our processes compared to other agencies. First, we create the most necessary website features.
